answerText: homology [word forms ok][10] A specific type of homologous structures, called orthologs, are separated by a speciation event. This type of speciation occurs when a population is divided by some kind of physical or geographic barrier.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | Editors Packet 4 | 9 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: A "percent" version of this property is derived from the sequence similarity of two similar genes, and that property is used to map genes into phylogenetic trees. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this adjective that describes traits that derive from a common ancestor. The human arm, whale fin, and bat wing are some examples.
